text: Les Achards is a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of La Mothe-Achard (the seat) and La Chapelle-Achard.Arrêté préfectoral 30 September 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Vendée
title: Les Achards
